dsOverview.title: U.S.S.R. Radiosonde Observations, 1961-1970

summary.p: This dataset contains upper air reports from six stations in the U.S.S.R.: Olyonok, Kustanay, Petropavlosk-Kamchatskiy, Omsk, Alma-ata, and Chita, for the period from January 1961 to December 1970.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: RU/SRIHI/WDC > World Data Center, All-Union Scientific Research Institute for Hydrometeorological Information, Russia

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Altitude > Geopotential Height
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Upper Level Winds
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Water Vapor > Humidity
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Pressure > Atmospheric Pressure Measurements

geospatialCoverage.location: Continent > Europe > Eastern Europe > Western Russia
